attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for ministers who waste billions of public money
attributes.additional_details: For the last 30 years ministers have wasted billions of public money on failed projects and vanity projects.  With every new Govt comes the same old investigations/consultations for already rejected changes or projects - HS2, Millennium Dome, NHS computer systems, Police computer systems, Electric cars, Green taxes, Home Office/Immigration failed computer systems, School and Hospital PPI's
attributes.background: Make it law - when a minister wastes billions of public money, they are prosecuted with threat of a prison sentence and lose of ministerial pension.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about wasteful public spending, but we're not sure exactly what actions you want to be made a criminal offence, or who would determine if spending was wasteful.
